metadata.feature_description: Allows users to subscribe to files and folders for notifications on changes

steps.action: Navigate to Assets module and locate Images folder
steps.expected: Images folder visible in asset list
steps.actual: Images folder visible in asset list

steps.action: Hover over Images folder to reveal edit icon
Click edit icon to open folder details panel
steps.expected: Folder details panel opens with Subscribe toggle visible
steps.actual: Folder details panel opened with Subscribe toggle showing Off

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it On
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to On successfully

steps.action: Navigate to Home folder and locate batch_image_2.png file
steps.actual: File batch_image_2.png visible in asset list

steps.action: Hover over file to reveal edit icon and click it
steps.expected: File details panel opens with Subscribe toggle visible
steps.actual: File details panel opened with Subscribe toggle showing Off

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it On
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to On successfully

steps.action: Click Save button to persist changes
steps.actual: Changes saved successfully and panel closed

steps.action: Open file details for batch_image_2.png (previously subscribed)
steps.expected: File details panel shows Subscribe toggle as On
steps.actual: File details panel opened with Subscribe toggle showing On

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it Off
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to Off successfully

steps.action: Click Save button to persist changes
steps.actual: Changes saved successfully and panel closed

steps.action: Open folder details for Images folder
steps.actual: Folder details panel opened with Subscribe toggle showing Off (subscription from earlier test did not persist due to separate permissions issue)

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it On first
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to On successfully

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to turn it Off (unsubscribe)
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to Off successfully

observations: The Subscribe/Unsubscribe API is called immediately when the toggle is clicked, not when Save is clicked. This is confirmed by code review of Assets.js which shows changeSusbcription function binding to toggle change event.

Folder save operations encountered a JavaScript error related to permissions module loading ('Cannot read properties of undefined (reading getPermissions)'). This error is unrelated to subscription functionality and does not affect the Subscribe/Unsubscribe API calls which occur on toggle change.
File save operations worked correctly without errors.
The Subscribe toggle is available in both file and folder edit panels, accessible via the pencil (edit) icon that appears on hover over items.

Code review confirms POST endpoints at /API/PersonaBar/Assets/Subscribe and /API/PersonaBar/Assets/Unsubscribe handle subscription requests with ChangeSubscriptionRequest DTO containing IsFolder (bool) and ItemId (int) parameters.
